title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8140.29 - Town of Lawrence
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8140.29 - Town of Lawrence

State Regulations
(a) Route 11. The eastbound and westbound roadways of Route 11 between the intersection of

Route 11C and the Franklin county line, a distance of 3.1+- miles. (b) Route 11. The northbound and southbound
roadways of Route 11 between the intersection of Route 11C and CR 74 (North

Lawrence - Moira Road), a distance of 1.9+- miles, are designated as an access
highway for use by 48-foot long, 102-inch wide trailers only, and are not
hereby designated for use by any other types of vehicles. (c) CR 74 (North Lawrence - Moira Road). The
eastbound and westbound roadways of CR 74 (North Lawrence - Moira Road) between
the intersection of Route 11 and the entrance to the Kraft, Inc. plant, a
distance of 0.2+- mile, are designated as an access highway for use by 48-foot
long, 102-inch wide trailers only, and are not hereby designated for use by any
other types of vehicles. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8140.29

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
